summary: Completed Loop 004 HabitPulse QA placeholder coverage with additive, backward-compatible streak edge-case checks and contract field constraints; prior loop outputs remain accepted. Work is represented by commits 93876d6, 3e8b61e, and final loop-004 QA commit f324bae.
risks: Checklist and contract spec are documentation-level artifacts and are not yet backed by executable automated tests.
Timezone and DST behavior is specified in QA notes but still depends on implementation consistency in downstream services.
